data.name: TipsWhenUploadingStasticsReport
data.value:
Hi, you can send each type summary to excel via your SkyDrive service.
· Text summary · Pie chart summary · line graph chart summary
each type summary has its own excel content format. By the way, Pie chart summary and Text summary will use same format, cause they can be in same file.
Have fun!

data.name: ScheduleManager_BadScheduledItemNeedToRemoveMessage
data.value:
We found this schedule item has some invalid associated data(account, or category), which are missed in current database.
We recommend you deleting this item.

data.name: HowToCreateExpenseOrIncomeSchedule
data.value:
Hi, welcome to use "scheduled tally task" feature, which allows you set up automatical tally transcation records.
It'll take advantage of the 'Background Agent' built in OS, and the running cycle is not regular that the new task may won't be executed immediately.(But at last one time in a day).
If you want to let it execute right now, you can 'tap' the 'execute now' menu in 'scheduled task setting' page.
NOTICE: If 15 days app hasn't been opened, the background tasks would be turn off, until next time open.

data.name: RefreshSchedulePlaningMessage
data.value:
The 'Refresh' action will set the tasks' status back to: unexecuted.
Continue?

data.value: We does not support the {0} language currently.

data.name: Lable_CurrentVoiceLanguage_Tips
data.value: You need to update voice command data after the Voice Language is changed.

data.name: Message_ContaionsInvalidAccountOrCategoryNameInVoiceData
data.value: There contains some invalid "Account" or "Category" names in voice command data. Please make sure no any '>', '<', ‘&' characters in account list or category list.

data.name: Message_ErrorOccuredWhenUpdatingVoiceCommandData
data.value: Sorry, errors occured when updating voice command data. Please try updating again according to the error message.

data.name: Message_InvalidVoiceCommandPrefix
data.value: The "Voice Command Prefix" is not valid, please check it is not conflicted with other app's.

data.name: Message_NoticeForPriceValueInVoiceCommandData
data.value: Due to some limition, the usable range of the price data in command data will be between:

data.name: Message_RequiredPrivacyAcceptionToUseVoiceCommand
data.value: You will need to accept the speech privacy policy in order to use speech recognition in this app.

data.name: Tips_ChangePriceValueRange
data.value: This setting allows you to control the support range of price value in voice command data. We set a default range, but many languages/countries have their own common used one. So you can manually change this.

data.name: Tips_NeedUpdateVoiceDataToEnableSetting
data.value: * Your changes will be available after you update the voice command data.

data.name: Tips_RecommandPriceValueRange
data.value: * We recommand to set a common used range.

data.name: VoiceCommandPrefix_Tips
data.value: Means: the leading works to start voice command for accountbook. It should be in same language with the voice language to ensure the voice command can be detected.

data.name: VoiceCommandConfirm_OkOrCancel
data.value: You can say OK or Cancel.

data.name: VoiceCommandConfirm_OkToCreate
data.value: Say OK to create an transaction item.

data.name: VoiceCommandConfirm_Summary
data.value: Will create an {3} item by {0}, for {1}, total {2} {4}, you can say OK or Cancel.

data.name: VoiceCommandSetting_Tips
data.value:
You need to update "Voice Command Data" when folllowing condition happened: 1. After your categories change, including amounts, names... 2. After the Speech Language is modified in OS' setting page. 3. After Settings in this page changed. 4. After you restore data from SkyDrive or other places.
* Accountbook won't share your voice data to any others.
